Flavors of the Season

Get ready for a culinary celebration like no other with Delicious! Join us for our upcoming event, "Flavors of the Season," where we'll dive into the vibrant tastes of the current season. From curated showcases highlighting fresh, seasonal ingredients to live cooking demos by renowned chefs, this week-long event promises to elevate your culinary experience. Participate in contests for a chance to win exciting prizes, share your seasonal creations with the community, and connect with fellow food enthusiasts. Save the date, stay tuned for updates, and get ready to savor the joy of seasonal cooking with Delicious!

Place: R32 Vyloppilly Nagar,Kochi,Kerala
Time: 07:30pm
